content.summary: Mail01 has been successfully configured to use Gmail as its sole email provider. All SendGrid dependencies have been removed from the active codebase.

details: Using Nodemailer with Gmail SMTP configuration
Environment configured with GMAIL_USER and GMAIL_APP_PASSWORD
NO active SendGrid code in TypeScript files
Only 1 TS file mentions SendGrid (in comment for Gmail route)
All SendGrid files backed up with .bak extension
SendGrid API key still in environment (can be removed)

codebase_statistics.note: The single TS file only has SendGrid in a comment

recent_commits: 481528a9: complete transition from SendGrid to Gmail
d49c3718: transition Mail-01 from SendGrid to Gmail

revolutionary_features: Smart Compose with bullet point generation
content.recommendation: The project successfully meets the requirement of supporting only Gmail. The SendGrid API key in environment can be safely removed as it is no longer used anywhere in the active codebase.
next_steps: Delete .bak files if no longer needed
Clean up old SendGrid JSON logs in agent/inbox/sent/
